titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Isakson. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs for the 115th Congress.
Limits expenses of such committee to specified amounts from: (1) March 1, 2017, through September 30, 2017, (2) October 1, 2017, through September 30, 2018, and (3) October 1, 2018, through February 28, 2019.
